revision.text:
==Metaphor Data Guide== To edit a metaphor or create a new metaphor, type its name in the box below. If the metaphor already exists, you will be taken to its edit page, otherwise, you can create it from scratch. * Metaphor names should be in all caps
{{#forminput:form=Metaphor|link text= New Metaphor|button text=Create/Edit Metaphor|autocomplete on category=Metaphor}} The list of metaphors is now found here: [[:Category:Metaphor|Metaphors]]. A list of metaphor families can be found here: [[Metaphor Families]] Metaphors listed by type: [[Metaphors by Type]] The list of frames can be found here: [[:Category:Frame|Frames]]. A list of frame families can be found here: [[Frame Families]]. Frames divided into Cogs and Frames can be found here: [[Cogs and Frames]] ==Metaphor Summary Pages== These are pages put together to allow for the browsing of metaphors according to useful descriptive categories. * [[Metaphors that participate in transitive chains]] * [[Metaphors listed by status]] * [[Metaphors with missing fields]] * [[Metaphors indexed by aliases]] * [[Frames listed by status]] * [[Frames with missing fields]] * [[Metaphors that need fixing]] * [[Frames that need fixing]] ==Metaphor Glossary and Property Guide== The glossary, which provides definitions for terms common to conceptual metaphor theory and/or this wiki, is located here: [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Glossary Glossary]. These are the properties that are used to describe a metaphor. You can click on any of the properties to get a better description of its intended filler
[[Property:Related metaphor| Metaphor Relations]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Experiential basis | Experiential Basis of Metaphor]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Level | Metaphor Level]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Type | Metaphor Type]]
[[Property:Inference | Metaphor Inference]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Source frame | Source Domain]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Target frame | Target Domain]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Alias.Provenance | Provenance]]
[[Property:Status | Status]]
[[Property:Entered by | Entered by]]
[[Property:Last reviewed by | Last Reviewed]]
[[Property:Mapping | Mappings]]
==Metaphor Standards== Refer to the [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Standards Standards page] for guides on capitalization, citation, and so on.

==Metaphor Data Guide== To edit a metaphor or create a new metaphor, type its name in the box below. If the metaphor already exists, you will be taken to its edit page, otherwise, you can create it from scratch. * Metaphor names should be in all caps
{{#forminput:form=Metaphor|link text= New Metaphor|button text=Create/Edit Metaphor|autocomplete on category=Metaphor}} The list of metaphors is now found here: [[:Category:Metaphor|Metaphors]]. A list of metaphor families can be found here: [[Metaphor Families]] Metaphors listed by type: [[Metaphors by Type]] The list of frames can be found here: [[:Category:Frame|Frames]]. A list of frame families can be found here: [[Frame Families]]. Lista de metáforas lingüísticas: [[:Category:Linguistic metaphor|Metáforas Lingüísticas]] Lista de metáforas agrupadas por familia: [[Metaphor Families|Familias de Metáforas]] Lista de metáforas agrupadas por tipo: [[Metaphors by Type|Tipos de Metáforas]] Lista de esquemas: [[List of all Frames|Esquemas]]. Lista de familias de esquemas: [[Frame Families|Familias de Esquemas]] ([[Detailed Frame Families|con las unidades léxicas]]). Lista de esquemas agrupadas por los categorios de "Cogs" y "Frames": [[Cogs and Frames|Cogs y Frames]] Haz clic aquí para exportar metáforas y esquemas a RDF/OWL: [[Export Metaphors and Frames|Exportar Metáforas y Esquemas]] Un gráfico de relaciones entre todas metáforas actuales está aquí: [[Map of all metaphors|Mapa de Metáforas]] ==Páginas de resumen de metáforas== Estas son páginas construidas para ayudar la navegación de metáforas agrupadas en categorios útiles. * [[List of primary metaphors|Metáforas primarias]] * [[Metaphors that participate in transitive chains|Metáforas que participa en cadenas transitivas]] * [[Metaphors listed by status|Situación de metáforas]] * [[Metaphors with missing fields|Metáforas que faltan datos]] * [[Metaphors indexed by aliases|Metáforas listadas por alias]] * [[Frames listed by status|Situación de esquemas]] * [[Frames with missing fields|Esquemas que faltan datos]] * [[Metaphors that need fixing|Metáforas para arreglar]] * [[Frames that need fixing|Esquemas para arreglar]] * [[Metaphor Lists for Status Reports|Metáforas listadas de informes de estado]] * [[CMs with LMs|CMs con todos los ejemplos LM]] ==Glosario de metáforas y guía de campos de datos== El glosario, que tiene definiciones de términos normales de la teoría de metáfora conceptual y/o de este wiki, está aquí: [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Glossary Glossario]. Estas son las propiedades que se utiliza en describir una metáfora. Se puede hacer clic en cualquiera propiedad para ver una descripción detallada del uso previsto.
[[Property:Related metaphor| Relaciones de metáfora]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Experiential basis | Base experimental de metáfora]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Level | Nivel de metáfora]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Type | Tipo de metáfora]]
[[Property:Inference | Inferencias de metáfora]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Source frame | Source Domain]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Target frame | Target Domain]]
[[Property:Metaphor.Alias.Provenance | Procedencia]]
[[Property:Status | Situación]]
[[Property:Entered by | Introducido por]]
[[Property:Last reviewed by | Última revista]]
[[Property:Mapping | Mappings]]
==Estándares de metafora== Vea a la [http://metaphor.icsi.berkeley.edu/metaphor/index.php/Standards Página de Estándares] para la guía de estilo para el uso de mayúsculas, citas, etc.
